name: All That Remains (Beta)
description:
Broken stones, creeping ivy, and faded books...

What happens to the places that we no longer remember? In this world, a group of nature spirits, called spriggans, must find these abandoned ruins and restore them to their former glory. These are the world’s menders, archivists, and archeologists.

You will play with a party of such spirits, to preserve and stabilize all that remains. You have the power to know the unknown.

Utilizes the oracle system as seen in The Quiet Year by Avery Alder. Suits 3-5 players, ages 10 and up. Requires at least one d6 and a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Paper and writing tools recommended.

This game is still in development and is subject to heavy revisions in the future. Please consider supporting the project, following it's progress, and leaving feedback so that I may continue to improve.
